data.name: Happy’s Humble Burger Farm: Seacoast Row (OST)
data.detailed_description: Seacoast Row is a sci-fi spaghetti western concept album with very long tracks to zone out to. Have a road trip to embark on through a tumble-weed covered desert expanse? This album wants a word with you!
data.about_the_game: Seacoast Row is a sci-fi spaghetti western concept album with very long tracks to zone out to. Have a road trip to embark on through a tumble-weed covered desert expanse? This album wants a word with you!
